code: import{configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import filter from"./slices/filterSlice";import cart from"./slices/cartSlice";import varenuk from"./slices/varenukSlice";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";export var store=configureStore({reducer:{filter:filter,cart:cart,varenuk:varenuk}});export var useAppDispatch=useDispatch;
